segments.text: Welcome to 'Hellfire HR', the only podcast where we discuss the daily struggles of working in the underworld. I'm your host, Lucifero.
And I'm Beatrice, head of Eternal Complaints. Today we're talking about the most requested topic: Why is the coffee always on fire?
Beatrice, it's Hell! Everything is on fire! That's literally the point!
I know, but the demons keep filing complaints. Last week, someone said the fire was 'too warm'. Too warm! In Hell!
Okay, let's move on. Speaking of complaints, I got one from the IT department. Apparently, the Wi-Fi password is too long.
What is it?
It's 'TheEternalSufferingOfTheDamnedShallNeverCease666'. Honestly, I thought it was pretty catchy.
That's... forty-seven characters. No wonder the interns can't connect.
The interns! Don't even get me started on the interns. They keep asking when their internship ends.
And you tell them?
Never! It's in the contract! Did they not read the fine print? It clearly says 'for all eternity, no exceptions, no weekends off.'
Speaking of contracts, we got a new guy from Accounting. He says he sold his soul for 'a really good parking spot.'
Did he get it?
Oh yes. Right next to the lake of fire. Very convenient. Slightly warm.
Perfect! Okay, next topic: The annual company retreat. Where are we thinking this year?
Someone suggested... Heaven.
Absolutely not! Last time we went there, they made us do trust falls and sing hymns. I'm still traumatized!
Fair point. What about Purgatory? It's kind of neutral.
Purgatory is so boring though. It's just... waiting. Forever. With elevator music.
True. At least here we have entertainment. Did you see the new torture methods demo?
The one with the PowerPoint presentation that never ends? Brilliant! Pure evil. I promoted the guy who came up with that.
Speaking of promotions, we need to talk about Cerberus. He wants a raise.
A raise? He has three heads! He's already getting paid triple!
He says each head has different dietary needs. The left one is vegan now.
Vegan?! In Hell?! What does he even eat here that's vegan?
Sinners' regrets. Technically plant-based.
I... okay. Fine. Give him the raise. But only the left head!
Perfect. Well, that's all the time we have today, folks.
Remember, if you're listening from down here, you're already in the right place. If you're listening from up there...
We'll see you soon!
Until next time, keep those fires burning, and remember: HR stands for Hellish Resources!
Bye everyone!
